details.summary: Checking the list of contacts to validate whether the new record is in the list or not
details.description:
Validating whether new record which we just inserted is returning via the List Contact API.

For response validation, we have used Default Validator.

We have ignored rest of the records in the expected body except the record which we want to validate. This is an example of partial response validation.

content.name: John Doe
content.aboutMe: [updated] My name can be used as a placeholder name and I don't have any real identity.
